The FDA ( U.S. Food Drug Administration ) approve GO-203-2C treatment disease . The FDA ( U.S. Food Drug Administration ) approve bortezomib treatment option disease . Myeloma cell harbor increased amount MUC1 cell surface . By bind MUC1 , GO-203-2C show cause tumor cell death laboratory study . Bortezomib intravenously subcutaneously administer medication belongs class drug call proteasome inhibitor . Proteasome inhibitor disrupt normal action cell breakdown protein normal cancer cell . The Investigators want find high dose GO-203-2C give combination bortezomib administer safely without severe unmanageable side effect .
